content: double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 6 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 3 times * double_crochet in nxt 14 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st 3 times * repeat from * to * 4 times double_crochet in nxt 6 sts chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain turn row 7 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet in the 1st double_crochet double_crochet in nxt 8 sts chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st *double_crochet in nxt 18 sts ch1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st* repeat from * to * 4 more times double_crochet in nxt 8 sts chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain - turn row 8 chain 4 skip chain space and double_crochet in 1st double_crochet * double_crochet in each chain space and each double_crochet across * repeat from * to * to last double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain of chain 4 turning chain turn row 1 8 form the pattern continue until work measures approx 27 or desired length ending with a row 1 note ***each row 1 will now be as follows chain 4 skip chain space double_crochet in nxt stitch *chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in nxt st* across to end *** edging when final row is complete do not turn ch1 and place 2 single_crochet in the corner space continue around the blanket placing 2 single_crochet in each chain space and 3 in each corner space slip_stitch to first single_crochet and fasten_off weave in ends your tranquil baby blanket is now complete and ready to enjoy or you may add a border of your choice if desired ** i hope you enjoyed using my free pattern all i ask in return is you give me lisa wears credit as the designer thank you ** © lisa wears
